json.schemas.desc: Associate schemas to JSON files in the current project
json.schemas.url.desc: A URL to a schema or a relative path to a schema in the current directory
json.schemas.fileMatch.desc: An array of file patterns to match against when resolving JSON files to schemas.
json.schemas.fileMatch.item.desc: A file pattern that can contain '*' to match against when resolving JSON files to schemas.
json.schemas.schema.desc: The schema definition for the given URL. The schema only needs to be provided to avoid accesses to the schema URL.
mysql.description: MySQL extension for Azure Data Studio
mysql.logDebugInfo.description: [Optional] Log debug output to the VS Code console (Help -> Toggle Developer Tools)
mysql.configuration.title: MySQL configuration
mysql.debugSourcePath.description: [Optional] Path to the source directory of the MySQL Tools Service, for debugging
mysql.useDebugSource.description: [Optional] Enable running the MySQL extension via the path set in MySQL.debugSourcePath
mysql.enableStartupDebugging.description: [Optional] Whether to make the MySQL Tools Service wait for a debugger to attach when starting
mysql.debugServerPort.description: [Optional] The port to run the MySQL Tools Service remote debugger on (default 3000)
mysql.defaultDatabase.description: The default database to use when creating a new MySQL connection
mysql.format.keywordCase.description: [Optional] Changes how keywords are formatted. Allowed values are 'upper', 'lower' and 'capitalize'.
mysql.format.identifierCase.description: [Optional] Changes how identifiers are formatted. Allowed values are 'upper', 'lower' and 'capitalize'.
mysql.format.stripComments.description: [Optional] If true comments are removed from the statements
mysql.format.reindent.description: [Optional] If true the indentations of the statements are changed.
mysql.connectionOptions.dbname.descripti: The name of the initial catalog or database in the data source
mysql.connectionOptions.user.description: Indicates the user ID to be used when connecting to the data source
mysql.connectionOptions.password.descrip: Indicates the password to be used when connecting to the data source
mysql.connectionOptions.connectTimeout.d: Seconds to wait before timing out when connecting
mysql.connectionOptions.clientFlag.descr: Custom flags to send to the MySQL server
mysql.connectionOptions.ssl.description: The SSL mode to use when connecting
mysql.connectionOptions.ssl.key.descript: The path name of the client private key to use for the SSL certificate
mysql.connectionOptions.ssl.cert.descrip: The path of the SSL client certificate file
mysql.connectionOptions.ssl.ca.descripti: The path of the SSL CA certificate file
mysql.resourceDeployment.description: Create an Azure Database for MySQL flexible server - a fully managed MySQL database as a service on Azure.
mysql.resourceDeployment.helpTexts.templ: Azure Database for MySQL Flexible Server is a relational database service powered by the MySQL community edition. It's a fully managed database as a service offering that can handle mission-critical workloads with predictable performance and dynamic scalability. Additionally, it is designed for more granular control and flexibility over database management functions and configuration settings. {0}
